title: Oliver
description: The story is of the orphan Oliver Twist, who is born in a workhouse and is then sold into apprenticeship with an undertaker.
author: Charles Dickens

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
description: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory is a 1964 children's novel by British author Roald Dahl. The story features the adventures of young Charlie Bucket inside the chocolate factory of eccentric chocolatier Willy Wonka.
author: Roald Dahl

title: The fellowship of the Ring
description: The story begins in the Shire, where the hobbit Frodo Baggins inherits the Ring from Bilbo Baggins...
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

title: The Two Towers
description: Orcs sent by Saruman and Sauron kill Boromir and take Merry and Pippin. Aragorn, Gimli and Legolas debate amongst themselves which pair of hobbits to follow...
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

title: The Return of the King
description: Sauron sends a great army against Gondor. Gandalf arrives at Minas Tirith to warn Denethor of the attack, while Th√©oden musters the Rohirrim to ride to Gondor's aid...
